summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to land use and zoning, amending Plat 52W, page 132 of the Official Land Use Map, to rezone approximately 5,074.8 square feet of property located at 3051 Beacon Avenue South from Lowrise 2 (L2) to Neighborhood Commercial 1 with a 30-foot height limit (NC1/30'). (Petition of Fred and Mariana Quarnstrom, C.F. 300094)
committee: Housing, Community Development and Urban Environment
